meanings.definition: A small, loosely aggregated mass or tuft.
meanings.sent1: The flocculi of dust gathered in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: She brushed away the flocculi of lint from her sweater.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the flocculi of yarn, thinking it was a tiny creature.
meanings.sent4: The flocculi of clouds in the sky resembled fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent5: The flocculi of foam on top of her latte looked like delicate lace.
